summary: This is for those of us who are either too lazy or don't want to smith up the Rings of Ultravision created by johneh87 ( http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14609/ ). This places one of each ring in a chest in Riverwood by Alvor's house.
descriptionHtml:
Don't want to smith up the awesome rings of Ultravision, don't have the components or time to hunt them down? Then this is the mod for you. It places one of each ring in a chest next to Alvor's house in Riverwood. Chest doesn't respawn so don't lose them or you'll have to smith them. :D

This mod requires johneh87's Rings of Ultravision ( http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14609/ ) to work and this mod has to go after his mod.
author: llloyd
